system.description:
Effect: All valid targets are @Affliction[dazzled] 5 and @Affliction[vulnerable] 5.
The user may spend up to 6 additional PP, increasing the Power of this attack by 15 per PP spent.
Requirement: User is a Dynamaxed Melmetal and has a Steel-Type attack on their Active List.
